name: Celina Arya
top_product: My top service product is a fully bundled PoSH-compliance package: from policy drafting and ICC setup to employee & IC member training, documentation systems, annual reporting and culture building. It gives organizations a one-stop solution so they don’t have to piece together separate vendors.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a small/mid-sized company or educational institute in Gujarat or western India (Ahmedabad / Jamnagar) with 10 or more employees, where the leadership recognizes the imperative of statutory compliance under the The Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013. Specifically, I’m looking for an organisation that either: • Has a PoSH policy but no formal Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) in place, or • Has an ICC and policy but needs support with annual documentation, training or culture-integration. If you know someone who says “We don’t know if our PoSH setup is robust enough” or “We need to train our IC members + employees on PoSH and document our compliance properly” — that’s exactly the kind of referral I’d love to receive.
top_problem_solved: When a company was preparing to go out with its investor-deck, they realised their Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013 (“PoSH”) compliance wasn’t investor-ready. I stepped in and within a few days created and established a full PoSH-policy system — from policy drafting, ICC setup, to documentation workflows and training. They went to the investors fully compliant and confident.
my_favourite_bni_story: Still creating - will update soon :)

name: Dharmesh Patel
top_product: we offer a comprehensive range of insurance and investment products tailored to meet the needs of individuals, families, and businesses. Our life insurance portfolio includes term plans, guaranteed return policies, endowment and money-back plans, ULIPs, retirement and pension plans, as well as child education and marriage policies—all designed to secure your long-term financial future. Under health insurance, we provide individual and family floater plans, ₹1 crore health coverage, senior citizen policies, critical illness cover, maternity benefits, and top-up/super top-up options. In the general insurance segment, we offer motor insurance (car/bike), personal accident cover, travel insurance, home insurance, fire and property insurance, marine insurance, and various liability products. For corporate clients, we specialize in group mediclaim (GMC), group personal accident (GPA), employee compensation (EC), corporate term life insurance, fire and industrial insurance, cyber protection plans, and comprehensive office insurance. On the investment front, we assist with mutual funds and SIPs across equity, debt, hybrid, and tax-saving ELSS categories. We also provide solutions for guaranteed income plans, child future planning, fixed return investments, and NPS guidance, along with complete tax planning strategies under sections like 80C and 10D. Our aim is to deliver end-to-end financial solutions with trusted guidance and personalized support.
ideal_referral: An individual, family, or business owner looking for trusted guidance on insurance, investment planning, or financial protection. Especially ideal are HR managers, startup founders, or working professionals seeking: Life or health insurance Group/corporate insurance plans Mutual fund or SIP investments Retirement or tax-saving solutions
top_problem_solved: We help individuals and companies protect their future by solving key financial challenges such as lack of proper insurance coverage, high medical expenses, poor investment planning, and unsecured employee benefits. For businesses, we provide cost-effective group insurance and risk management solutions. For individuals, we offer personalized financial planning to ensure long-term security, tax savings, and peace of mind.
